Articles.Content:
Hey y'all,

I've been reading through threads and mod descriptions (oh so many gorgeous mods) this week since I picked up the game, but I haven't been able to find an answer to this question - do tech tree changes add to each other or replace each other.

For example, if I have two mods (mod A and mod and both add items to (for example) survivability, will I see the added items for both mods in survivability in the R&D centre, or will one override the other?

(I'm only asking about additions to the stock tree here, rather than moving stock parts around or changing node names, etc).

In the end I went and experimented - and provided they just add things rather than altering stock, they are definitely additive .

I am not quite sure how this works for altering stock or for things that add new nodes like Interstellar though.

Those nodes are actually stock. They were added by devs for future mods could use them.

Only issue would be if mod rearranged them.
